str2: LORD -- the proper name of the God of Israel

parse: Verb - Qal - Imperfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To reign, inceptively, to ascend the throne, to induct into royalty, to take counsel

str2: gods -- the supreme God, magistrates, a superlative
Zion -- a mountain in Jerusalem, also a name for Jerusalem
A revolution of time, an age, generation, a dwelling
